Retina type 5 cone bipolar cell.Title: Immunocytochemical identification of cone bipolar cells in the rat retina
Retina type 5 cone bipolar cell.EditorialNote: Pub Med ID was incorrect in spreadsheet;  check with Mihail to make sure article correct
Retina type 5 cone bipolar cell.Definition: Type 5 and type 6, both have a very narrow ramification. By using Normaski optics, the two cell types can be distinguished by their stratification level within the IPL relative to a band of higher optical density, which is localized at the border of strata 3 and 4 and represents the inner cholinergic band.
